Title: Raona Showcase
Description: Raona Showcase is a new visualization concept that applies new Silverlight 3 features to traditional commercial displays. It's useful to mix images and messages in a configurable scenario via XML files and put focus on valuable products, services and samples. Created by RaonaLab.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Raona Showcase is a new visualization concept that applies new Silverlight 3 features to traditional commercial displays. It's useful to mix images and messages in a configurable scenario via XML files and put focus on valuable products, services and samples. Created by RaonaLab.
